title: [BUG] Anchor links are not parsed properly
body: I often want to only link to a comment in the same discussion and this can be done by linking to #comment_id. But such links just do not work: [Guidelines](#description-title)

replies.body: Hey there, so from my understanding this is a conscious decision that we've made for security reasons - to now allow relative links. If you want to link to a comment with the #id, you have to provide the full page url.

Then maybe you could add an exception for anchors specifically. There is no security violation they could lead to. And you can match them easily - nothing that begins with hashtag can be interpreted as anything else than anchor. Anchors are not even sent to the server.

I was asking for this feature because I see a potentional *Guides* board here and guides are long enough to have table of contents.
